reviewText: My kids liked it.  It was a bit of a suspense thriller for kids, but they really liked it in the end.

This movie is great for parents who are looking to allow a video from time to time but also want that video to support the values they are teaching.  The Odyssey DVDs incorporate Biblical teaching into a fun format that kids like.  I have a 6, 4, and 2 year old who all enjoy these movies.
